original: gang zhig so so rang rig bsgom //
analyzed: gang zhig so so rang rig bsgom //
translated: Whoever meditates on individual knowledge

original: rang gi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rang gi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: Will attain their own spiritual powers.

original: @70b so so rang rig las 'di ni //
analyzed: @70b so so rang rig las 'di ni //
translated: From individual knowledge, this

original: gnod pa las 'di skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gnod pa las 'di skye bar 'gyur //
translated: Arises as a harm.

original: rang gi byed po rang rig sdud pa po'o //
analyzed: rang gi byed po rang rig sdud pa po'o //
translated: The creator is the knower, the collector.

original: bdag nyid rgyal po bdag nyid gtso bo yin //üîΩ'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin nges par na //
analyzed: bdag nyid rgyal po bdag nyid gtso bo yin // 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin nges par na //
translated: The king is oneself, the principal is oneself.üîΩDesire, anger, and likewise,

original: gti mug dang ni phrag dog nga rgyal rnams //üîΩrig pa'i rgyal po bde chen las ;
analyzed: gti mug dang ni phrag dog nga rgyal rnams // rig pa'i rgyal po bde chen las ;
translated: Ignorance, envy, and pride

original: / nyon mongs lnga po dag tu blta //
analyzed: / nyon mongs lnga po dag tu blta //
translated: Are seen as the five afflictionsüîΩFrom the king of knowledge, great bliss.

original: bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis //üîΩgnod par ma gyur gang de tshe //
analyzed: bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis // gnod par ma gyur gang de tshe //
translated: When there is no harm from hunger and thirst,

original: bshang dang gci sogs 'jug pa med //
analyzed: bshang dang gci sogs 'jug pa med //
translated: and when there is no engagement in feces, urine, and so on,

original: de tshe grub pa dag tu bsgrags //
analyzed: de tshe grub pa dag tu bsgrags //
translated: at that time, it is proclaimed as accomplishment.

original: de phyir bde ldan thob 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de phyir bde ldan thob 'gyur zhing //
translated: Therefore, one will attain the state of bliss,

original: dpa' bo bde chen thub pa yis //
analyzed: dpa' bo bde chen thub pa yis //
translated: and the hero, the sage of great bliss,

original: don chen bde ba la brten nas //
analyzed: don chen bde ba la brten nas //
translated: based on the bliss of great meaning,

original: rnam pa kun du dngos grub dag / nye bar rab tu gnas 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du dngos grub dag / nye bar rab tu gnas 'gyur zhing //
translated: all accomplishments will be present,

original: mngon shes lnga yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: and the five superknowledges will also arise.

original: lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / lha'i sna dang // lha yi ro dag dang / lha'i reg bya dang / yid kyi lus kyis gzhan du gnas pa rnams des longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba dang / lha'i sna dang // lha yi ro dag dang / lha'i reg bya dang / yid kyi lus kyis gzhan du gnas pa rnams des longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: With the divine eye, divine ear, divine nose, divine taste, divine touch, and mental body, one will enjoy the abodes of others.

original: dpal dom bi he ru kas mdzad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa grub pa las /
analyzed: dpal dom bi he ru kas mdzad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa grub pa las /
translated: From the Accomplishment of Coemergence composed by the glorious Dombƒ´heruka.

original: spyod pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o /
analyzed: spyod pa'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o /
translated: The third chapter explaining the reality of conduct.

original: // / dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi lhan cig skyes pa grub pa las /
analyzed: // / dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi lhan cig skyes pa grub pa las /
translated: From the Accomplishment of Coemergence of the glorious Hevajra Tantra.

original: lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa slob dpon chen po dpal dom bi he ru ka'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa bstan pa slob dpon chen po dpal dom bi he ru ka'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The teaching on connate wisdom by the great master ≈örƒ´ Dombƒ´heruka is complete.
